publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6980 Sandra White: Glasgow’s Double Triumph—That the Parliament congratulates Glasgow on winning two major prizes at the Scottish Events Awards that were held in the city’s new Grand Central Hotel; notes that the Chairman’s Award and the Best Medium Event Award were won in recognition of the city’s success in hosting the 2009 MOBO awards; values the work of EventScotland and Glasgow City Marketing Board for helping to achieve this success, and believes the Scottish Events Awards, which recognise achievements in the national events industry, to be prestigious. Supported by: Rob Gibson*, Pauline McNeill*, Stewart Maxwell*, Bob Doris*, Stuart McMillan*, Bill Kidd*
S3M-6980 Glasgow’s Double Triumph (lodged on 14 September 2010) Jamie Hepburn*, Angela Constance*, Hugh Henry*
S3M-6980 Glasgow’s Double Triumph (lodged on 14 September 2010) Gil Paterson*

S3M-6980 Sandra White: Glasgow’s Double Triumph—That the Parliament congratulates Glasgow on winning two major prizes at the Scottish Events Awards that were held in the city’s new Grand Central Hotel; notes that the Chairman’s Award and the Best Medium Event Award were won in recognition of the city’s success in hosting the 2009 MOBO awards; values the work of EventScotland and Glasgow City Marketing Board for helping to achieve this success, and believes the Scottish Events Awards, which recognise achievements in the national events industry, to be prestigious. Supported by: Rob Gibson, Pauline McNeill, Stewart Maxwell, Bob Doris, Stuart McMillan, Bill Kidd, Jamie Hepburn, Angela Constance, Hugh Henry, Gil Paterson
